content.raw:
I made some changes in 8efb534, `models_editor_joint_visuals_ian` branch, to minimize updates to the joint visual only when necessary mainly by using a few variables to track changes. You can consider mering it if it looks ok to you, thanks.

I also set a default axis value in joint inspector so that when a new joint gets added it has a non-zero axis
content.html:
I made some changes in 8efb534, models_editor_joint_visuals_ian branch, to minimize updates to the joint visual only when necessary mainly by using a few variables to track changes. You can consider mering it if it looks ok to you, thanks.

I also set a default axis value in joint inspector so that when a new joint gets added it has a non-zero axis
